summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Capgemini Newsletter website with Google Docs integration. All core features working correctly including navigation, responsive design, and content loading.

minor_issues.issue: Content takes 3-8 seconds to load due to CORS proxy latency
minor_issues.impact: User experience - loading spinner shows during content fetch
minor_issues.note: This is expected behavior with CORS proxy, content does load successfully

passed_tests: Homepage loads with Capgemini branding and logo
Fixed navbar displays all 9 section links correctly
All 9 section cards visible and clickable on homepage
Section card navigation works - routes to correct pages
Google Docs content loads and renders with sanitization
Back to Home link functions properly
Mobile menu toggle works with 10 navigation links
Footer displays correctly with all 3 external links
Responsive design works across desktop, tablet, and mobile viewports
Images from Google Docs load properly
Error handling with retry button implemented
success_percentage: frontend: 95% - All major functionality working, minor loading delay expected with CORS proxy
